summary: iPhone style icons for use with the different games Mod Organizer manages.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/58477-1-1411756057.png[/img][/center]
I created these iPhone style icons for Mod Organizer for my own use and decided to share them. There's nothing spectacular about these, just my preferences.Â  Each icon color is based on the Nexus color scheme for each game. The download includes 256x256 ico files and 512x512 png files for Oblivion, Fallout 3, Fallout New Vegas, and Skyrim. SKSE and TESVEdit icons graciously provided icons by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14122255/?]Spiker985[/url].


[color=#ffd966][size=3][b]How to Use[/b][/size][/color][size=2]
1. Extract .ico files to a location of your choosing[/size][size=2]
2. Right-click on the Mod Organizer Icon and click Properties[/size][size=2]
3. Click Change Icon[/size][size=2]
4. Click Browse and navigate to where you placed the .ico files and then click Open[/size][size=2]
5. Click OK[/size][size=2]
6. Click OK[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]
Mod Organizer by Tannin
[/url]
author: Sakr3d
